text:
The Ford Foundation “to advance human welfare. ’ ’
Trustees JOHN J. McCLOY, Chairman of the Board; Counsel, Milbank, Tweed, Hope & Hadley, New York, New York
DONALD K. DAVID, Vice Chairman of the Board; Chairman, Committee for Economic Development, New York, New York
STEPHEN D. BECHTEL, Chairman, Bechtel Corporation, San Francisco, California
EUGENE R. BLACK, President, International Bank for Reconstruction and Development, Washington, D. C.
JOHN COWLES, President, Minneapolis Star and Tribune Company, Minneapolis, Minnesota
MARK F ETHRIDGE, Publisher, The Courier-Journal, Louisville, Kentucky
BENSON FORD, Vice President, Ford Motor Company, Dearborn, Michigan
HENRY FORD II, Chairman and President, Ford Motor Company, Dearborn, Michigan
H. ROWAN GAITHER, JR., Partner, Draper, Gaither, and Anderson, San Francisco, California
LAURENCE M. GOULD, President, Carleton College, Northfield, Minnesota
HENRY T. HEALD, President, The Ford Foundation, New York, New York
ROY E. LARSEN, Chairman, Executive Committee, Time Inc., New York, New York
JULIUS A. STRATTON, President, Massachusetts Institute of Technology, Cambridge, Massachusetts
CHARLES E. WYZANSKI, JR., Judge, United States District Court, Boston, Massachusetts

DYKE BROWN, Vice President
CLARENCE H. FAUST, Vice President
F E HILL, Vice President
